snippet: The Boston Red Sox reached an agreement on a two-year, $26.5 million contract with the right-hander Ryan Dempster, adding a veteran starter to a thin rotation.
abstract: Boston Red Sox and pitcher Ryan Dempster agree to a two-year, $26.5 million contract, adding a veteran starter to a thin rotation.
lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox reached an agreement on a two-year, $26.5 million contract with the right-hander Ryan Dempster, adding a veteran starter to a thin rotation.

headline.main: Dempster Is Set to Join Red Sox
headline.print_headline: Dempster Is Set to Join Red Sox
